entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [macOS M1] dotnet publish using win-x64 runtime causes System.IO.FileLoadException when executable runs on Windows #36023
  • `--sdk-version` option in `dotnet workload install` command is not working in dotnet 8 rc2, but it was working in rc1 and before #36018
  • 8.0.100-rc.1 dotnet tool update fails #36015
  • [NET 8.0 - RC2] Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\.....\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23480.2.nupkg ......... #36000
  • Give guidance on how to publish custom files on `dotnet publish` #35998

Closed

  • `dotnet tool restore` throws `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` #34347
    8.0.2xx
  • dotnet tool init #23561
    Backlog
  • Dotnet tool restores the wrong version for prerelease packages #35999
  • `BaseImageNotFoundException` when trying to build a container with `-r linux-musl-x64` starting with `8.0.0-rc2` #36022
  • “dotnet-osx-x64.latest.pkg” can’t be opened because it is from an unidentified developer. #7735
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: ProjectReference not transitive during "Pack" on multi-targeted project #35567

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a test for given unlisted tool specified version it can be installed #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35907
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1xx
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #35980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    Servicing-consider, Area-WebSDK
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #35913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI
